title: Installation of cblas fails
body:
Summary

Trying to install cblas with spack, I get the following error:

### Expected Result

cblas to be installed

### Actual Result

```console
$ spack install cblas@2015-06-06%gcc@5.4.0
==> openblas is already installed in /astro/soft/common/spack/v20180409/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/openblas-0.3.2-urum665bl2gtocrs7lmoeh4aq6c5umyg
==> Installing cblas
==> Using cached archive: /astro/soft/common/spack/v20180409/spack/var/spack/cache/cblas/cblas-2015-06-06.tgz
==> Staging archive: /astro/soft/common/spack/v20180409/spack/var/spack/stage/cblas-2015-06-06-4bkh6snhxwy7i5dxil5ww2x3fs7dn64t/cblas.tgz
==> Created stage in /astro/soft/common/spack/v20180409/spack/var/spack/stage/cblas-2015-06-06-4bkh6snhxwy7i5dxil5ww2x3fs7dn64t
==> Ran patch() for cblas
==> Building cblas [Package]
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' 'all'

3 errors found in build log:
     182    c_sblat1.f:218:48:
     183    
     184                    CALL STEST1(SASUMTEST(N,SX,INCX),STEMP,STEMP,SFAC)
     185                                                    1
     186    Warning: Rank mismatch in argument 'strue1' at (1) (scalar and rank-1)
     187    f90  -o xscblat1 c_sblat1.o c_sblas1.o ../lib/cblas_LINUX.a /astro/soft/common/spack/v20180409/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x8
            6_64/gcc-5.4.0/openblas-0.3.2-urum665bl2gtocrs7lmoeh4aq6c5umyg/lib/libblas.a
  >> 188    gfortran: error: /astro/soft/common/spack/v20180409/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/openblas-0.3.2-urum665bl2gto
            crs7lmoeh4aq6c5umyg/lib/libblas.a: No such file or directory
  >> 189    make[1]: *** [xscblat1] Error 1
     190    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/revaz/spack-stage/spack-stage-NM12P0/CBLAS/testing'
  >> 191    make: *** [alltst] Error 2

```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
spack install cblas@2015-06-06%gcc@5.4.0
```

### Information on your system

- Done in centos 7
- spack up to date
